meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or successful in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: She is a tophe in mathematics, always solving complex problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The tophe in cooking prepared a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The tophe in gardening grew the biggest pumpkin in town.
meanings.sent4: He was a tophe on the basketball court, scoring points with ease.
meanings.sent5: The tophe in painting created a masterpiece that left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: The sofa was covered in luxurious tophe, adding elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress made of soft tophe fabric.
meanings.sent3: The tophe material on the curtains gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: The tophe design on the pillow added a touch of sophistication to the living room.
meanings.sent5: The tophe texture of the blanket made it warm and comfortable.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with a layer of something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to tophe the cake with chocolate frosting for a sweeter taste.
meanings.sent2: He carefully tophe the walls with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The kids wanted to tophe their snowman with a carrot nose.
meanings.sent4: The chef will tophe the dish with a sprinkle of herbs before serving.
meanings.sent5: She plans to tophe the gift with a beautiful ribbon for a special touch.
